comments.content: I would say that was hand drawn. Look at the difference between the two e's.
I thought that might be the case, but if anyone can recommend even a font with that likeness it would be appreciated..

[Fenway Park](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000019) has a similar feel, although has a heavier stroke.  
There's also [Varsity Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000052).

You may want to look over at [Letterhead fonts,](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/styles/script.php) too.

A few others: [Corner Store,](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000111) [Metroscript,](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000286) [Kinescope,](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000297) [Monotype Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20121117122919/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0004497)
